name: Construction Office Online
overview:
Construction Office Online uses technology to help construction professionals extend their services in the construction industry.

ConstructionOfficeOnline provides pre-configured and formulated office templates and forms for quick use and re-use. These templates, most commonly built from Microsoft Excel, are designed to match the similarity of forms commonly used in the construction industry. An example of one template is a Construction Schedule in Excel with a built in Gantt chart that automatically changes as the setting for each task are changed.
